Main.JPN: 主婦撲殺事件担当課御中
Main.ENG: For the Attention of Those on the Housewife Slaughter Incident Case

Main.TextENG: ____ Prefecture Police Headquarters for the Eradication of Drug-Related Crime

Main.TextJPN: 鹿骨支部長　反町　尚之
秘匿捜査指定第１６８号事件について
Main.TextENG: Regarding incident 168 designated as undercover investigation

Main.TextJPN: 標記秘匿捜査事件（興宮警察署第１６８号、雛見沢村主婦撲殺事件）について関連すると思われる部分が、当本部担当事件の供述調書内に確認されたことを通達する。
Main.TextENG: This message is to inform you that a section of the testimony records of an incident under this police headquarters' jurisdiction has been found that is thought to be related to the undercover investigation of the incident in question (Okinomiya Police Station X, Hinamizawa Village housewife slaughter incident).

Main.TextJPN: ７月３日に麻薬取締法違反の現行犯で逮捕した当該容疑者への取調べ中、標記事件の犯行をほのめかす供述があり、その中に、犯人しか知り得ない情報が含まれていることが明らかとなった。
Main.TextENG: During investigation of suspect ___ ___ who was arrested for possession of illegal drugs, there was testimony alluding to the crime in question, and it became clear that it contained information that only the perpetrator could have known.

Main.TextJPN: よって、この供述調書（複写）を貴課に提供する用意がある。
Main.TextENG: Therefore, we are prepared to share this record of testimony with you (duplicate attached).

Main.TextJPN: この供述調書を信頼できるなら、当該容疑者は標記事件の実行犯である可能性が極めて高い。
Main.TextENG: If this testimonial is to be believed, then there is an extremely high chance that suspect ___ ___ was the perpetrator in the incident in question.

Main.TextJPN: なお、担当取調官はこの供述を受け、興宮警察署に事件の問い合わせをしたが、
Main.TextENG: In addition, on receiving this testimony the head investigator on the case inquired as to the incident with the Okinomiya Police Station,

Main.TextJPN: ７月１日県警本部長発令の秘匿捜査指定（昭和５７年総総管イ１－１２）を対応した興宮署担当者が誤解し、
Main.TextENG: but the responsible party at Okinomiya Police Station misunderstood, and in compliance with the designation as an undercover investigation by executive order from prefectural police headquarters on July 1 (1982, general administration, B1-12)

Main.TextJPN: 担当取調官に対し、事件の存在を正しく説明しなかった。
Main.TextENG: they did not explain the incident's existence to the head investigator as they should have.

Main.TextJPN: その為、担当取調官は標記事件に関連する供述を重要なものと認識せず、
Main.TextENG: Because of this, the head investigator did not realize the importance of the testimony as it related to the case in question,

Main.TextJPN: その結果、現場確認等を怠り、今日まで放置するに至ったことを謝罪する。
Main.TextENG: and as a result, was negligent when combing the scene; we apologize for having effectively ignored it until now.

Main.TextJPN: なお、当該容疑者は先日７月４日、留置場内にて死亡したことを追記する。
Main.TextENG: In addition, there is a postscript stating that suspect ___ ___ died while in confinement yesterday on July 7th.
